scripts.allure:clear: npm run clear:allure && npm run clear:cypress
scripts.cypress: npm run allure:clear && npx cypress run --browser firefox --spec cypress/e2e/test-cases/employee-claims-spec.cy.ts --env allure=true && npm run allure:report
scripts.ul-regression-allure: npx cypress run --browser firefox --spec cypress/e2e/test-cases/employee-claims-spec.cy.ts --env allure=true && npm run allure:report
